data.title: Timeline: What has happened in Niger since the coup?
data.excerpt: Niger’s President Mohamed Bazoum was elected two years ago in the first peaceful, democratic transfer of power since independence in 1960. But on July 26, members of his own presidential guard removed him from office, in the third coup in as many years to topple a leader in the Sahel region.
